title: Erin Doherty’s “Fever Dream” Year: The Brit on Unending ‘Adolescence’ Hype, Winning an Emmy and Season 2 of ‘A Thousand Blows’
summary: The young actress talks nabbing her first Golden Globe nom for the Netflix smash hit — and the show's impact on U.K. telly: "I think this has injected some kind of confidence in British art and British storytelling and just going, 'We're enough. Let's just do what's in your bones.'"

summary: The pop star ponders what life will be like after the Eras Tour in the Disney+ docuseries’ finale. Spoiler alert: her biggest album ever.

title: How U.S. oil tanker seizures targeting Venezuela are linked to rising geopolitical tensions with China
summary: U.S. seizures of vessels carrying Venezuelan oil may become a bigger strategic pressure point in the geopolitical battle with China, a major buyer of the crude.

summary: Everyone seems to be in agreement: global oil supply is greater than the demand for the fuel.
